name: Il avait les mains froides
description:
Individual school project during my last year at Isart Digital in 2014. The goal was to take a classic game, add a feature, prototype it and create a whole technical documentation. I took the opportunity to make a weird arcade game. The goal is to use boomerangs to score, but in tortured setting based on the Werter Opera, with a protogonist slowly falling into madness. From love to nightmare in 5 acts.

Credits:

- Marc-Antoine Archier: Music

- Christophe Galati: design, programming, art
